overview: Tight trousers, neat blazers and silk ties constrict the willing throats of impeccably dressed young men. The only thing sharper than the suits are the stares of mental undressing occurring, the tension is a palpable entity you could cut with a knife. Hands wander over the tailored edges of the well cut and dressed men, shirt buttons pop, ties tugged and finery hits the floor in UKHotJocks crisply turned out feature, Sharp. Staring the stiff dicks in suits.
title: Sharp
